message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 36
The Problem of Long-Term Dependencies [8]
RNNs connect previous information to the 
present task
But if the gap between the relevant information 
and the place that it’s needed is small
E.g., language model trying to predict the next 
word: “the clouds are in the sky”
36
speaker: SYSTEM
